column12:
"Proposed development in the Scenic Conservation
Overlay that involves the creation of two or more lots over a five-year period shall
be reviewed as a Planned Unit Development in accordance with Article 7 of this
bylaw […] All other pplicable proposed development located in the SCO
shall be subjected to Conditional Use Review" (Page 14).
column14:
"The following forms of development are prohibited in all hazard
areas […] New residential development " (Page 40).
